description:
I loved the app, but it has been revealed in twitter that Wire was bought by a US corp and did everything they could to hide the fact.
No security no beauty in design can soothe the impression that this is just an intelligence honeypot, the polar opposite of what it started being.

When a company tries to hide stuff like they were bought by the surveillance state#1 BAIL!
summary: Not secure, corrupt management, compromised data

description: Really loved this app. Can no longer endorse this product as it no longer stands for free software and is now proprietary in nature. I have been looking into completely secure an open source alternatives such as Jitsi and Session. So long Wire.
Doesn't integrate to the system theme (dark, KDE), like it does via the .deb package.
summary: Flatpak doesn't integrate to system theme

description: Works, but the app resets the theme to Light (from Dark) every time i restarts/have been closed.
Esta aplicacion la hizo en antiguo fundador de Skype y es na de las mejores que he probado la recomiendo.
summary: La mejor app de mensajeria y video llamabas
Одно из самых лучших приложений в своем роде
